code: import React,{useEffect,useState}from'react';import axios from'axios';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const API=process.env.REACT_APP_API;function App(){const[todos,setTodos]=useState([]);const[title,setTitle]=useState('');const fetchTodos=async()=>{const res=await axios.get(API);setTodos(res.data);};const addTodo=async()=>{await axios.post(API,{title});setTitle('');fetchTodos();};const toggleTodo=async(id,completed)=>{await axios.put("".concat(API,"/").concat(id),{completed:!completed});fetchTodos();};const deleteTodo=async id=>{await axios.delete("".concat(API,"/").concat(id));fetchTodos();};useEffect(()=>{fetchTodos();},[]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{style:{padding:'2rem'},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"\uD83D\uDCDD Todo List"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{value:title,onChange:e=>setTitle(e.target.value)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:addTodo,children:"Add"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("ul",{children:todos.map(_ref=>{let{_id,title,completed}=_ref;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("li",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{onClick:()=>toggleTodo(_id,completed),style:{textDecoration:completed?'line-through':'none',cursor:'pointer'},children:title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:()=>deleteTodo(_id),style:{marginLeft:'1rem'},children:"\u274C"})]},_id);})})]});}export default App;
